xmpp.tip: Tip: See the Info tab for help writing functions.
xmpp.help:
This node sends a notification with XMPP.

You can enter the recipient and message manually, or use
$message['xmpp-recipient']
$message['xmpp-message']
to inject / override it.

xmpp-server.help: The XMPP (Jabber) connection requires a server address (the FQDN or an IP-address without http(s)://), the port, the username (just the localpart) and a password to be added to the default configuration.
